full_address: 162/4 Old Burleigh Road, Surfers Paradise, Qld 4217
description:
This magnificent custom sky home is perched on the 34th floor and boasts incredible views . You will enjoy this large 270m2 floorplan that can be customised to suit all your families requirements.
Stylish and well-equipped large kitchen complete with Jennair interchangeable cooktop and Gaggenau oven will indulge your untamed appetite for cooking and entertaining in your house sized kitchen in your new beachfront abode.
Separate lounge and dining areas complete with formal and informal living areas makes this apartment a rare find as it is the only one in the building. Here is your opportunity to renovate for profit or create your ultimate modern home or separate and create 2 individual apartments catering for kids or family members.

This sky home is well appointed with quality fittings and fixtures and provides ample separate storage rooms and cupboard space to ensure all your belongings can be stored if your downsizing and available when required. Privacy, space and perfectly positioned, and room for renovations your oceanfront apartment awaits.

Short or long term income stream available or simply keep it as it has been all its life, a residential home.

Enjoy the Sunrise to the right and the Sunset's to the left as this apartment has the best of both worlds.
These amazing photos in this advertisement are from the actual apartment itself.

Some additional Features;

* Absolute beachfront building walk out to the sand, never to be built out * 270m2, 34th floor, Double Side by Side Car park on title
* Large open plan living with wrap around balcony with BBQ area
* Good sized bedrooms with further bedroom options can be easily created .
* Large well-lit study/media room with storage
* Two original large bathrooms with a huge spa in the master
* Sub penthouse size and quality, without the traditionally large price tag.
* Work from home with a designated office already installed
* Ceiling fans & air conditioning rarely needed as this apartment captures all the sea breezes.
* Separate laundry, wine cellar and additional internal storerooms.
*Fully Furnished and ready to pop into the income pool or move into
* Vacant and ready to immediately occupy, why wait for the new build at twice the price ?

Surfers Aquarius is famous for its large beachfront grounds sitting on two & half magnificent tropical and established acres. The facilities available are second to none offering a large outdoor swimming pool, children's wading pool, indoor heated pool, spa pools, male and female saunas, 2 floodlit tennis courts, squash court, putting green, gymnasium, children's play area, 4 BBQ areas all surrounded by lush tropical gardens and private access to the golden beaches of Surfers Paradise. This truly is a fantastic lifestyle opportunity for you to enjoy.

Inspection by private appointment unless advertised.
Secure this well priced beachfront asset and start planning your dream of beachfront living I have been given clear instructions this one needs to be sold.
